    Pathway_pcascore_run

    Pathway_pcascore_run.Rd

    The function can calculate the pathway pcascore for celltypes and single cells.

    Pathway_pcascore_run(
  Pagwas = NULL,
  Pathway_list = NULL,
  min.pathway.size = 10,
  max.pathway.size = 1000
)

    Arguments

    Pagwas

    Pagwas format

    Pathway_list

    Pathawy gene list(gene symbol),list name is pathway name.

    min.pathway.size

    Threshold for min pathway gene size.

    max.pathway.size

    Threshold for max pathway gene size.

    Value

    Examples

    library(scPagwas)
data(Genes_by_pathway.kegg)
#> Warning: data set 'Genes_by_pathway.kegg' not found
# the Pagwas shoul be after Single_data_input() and GWAS_summary_input()
Pagwas <- Pathway_pcascore_run(Pagwas = Pagwas, Pathway_list = Genes_by_pathway.kegg)
#> Error in Pathway_pcascore_run(Pagwas = Pagwas, Pathway_list = Genes_by_pathway.kegg): object 'Genes_by_pathway.kegg' not found
